product_name: Tune Belt Sport Armband for Samsung Galaxy S4 / S3 / S4 Active
long_description: The comfortable neoprene Tune Belt Sport Armband stabilizes and protects your Samsung Galaxy Note 3 or other similarly-sized phone and stays secure without feeling too tight.
short_description: The comfortable neoprene Tune Belt Sport Armband stabilizes and protects your Samsung Galaxy Note 3 or other similarly-sized phone and stays secure without feeling too tight.
